attributes.action: I want to change the support available for sufferers of FND
attributes.additional_details: People with FND are overlooked, disregarded, and/or ignored by GPs and so-called Neurologists, because the resources are not available to them to be able to fill understand our condition, or we are left on long waiting lists, to then be removed due to reasons including funding, and staffing. It is a debilitating and life changing condition and we demand more help to take control of our lives back from our condition
attributes.background: There is not enough funding, nor resources, to ensure that sufferers of FND get the help they need from the NHS at a local level, too many people are discharged without being offered the proper help, or left on waiting lists to then just be discharged and it is not good enough

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727063
